sentences: Amazon was founded by Jeff Bezos in Bellevue, Washington, in July 1994.

Brilliance Audio

Brilliance Audio is an audiobook publisher founded in 1984 by Michael Snodgrass in Grand Haven, Michigan.

Souq

Souq.com is the largest E-Commerce platform in the Middle East based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates.

Supply chain

Amazon first launched its distribution network in 1997 with two fulfillment centers in Seattle and New Castle, Delaware.
